project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a simple contact book application that allows users to add, search, update, and delete contacts. The contacts will be stored in a JSON file, and the interaction will happen through the terminal.

task.name: Implement functionality to search for contacts
Implement functionality to update existing contacts
Write tests for adding, searching, updating, and deleting contacts
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
